name: Away From Dark
description:
Away From Dark

Life is like an endless loop. We were taught by parents, teachers and the world from we were born, especially in oriental countries, most people cannot choose the life way, the families forcedly give them the direction of life. You only had a little holiday when we graduated from primary school and high school, then again jump into the universities. When you finally get out of the little tunnel called university, even haven’t shortly enjoy the sense of accomplishment, then will face with the problem of getting a better job, or continue studying on the master degree. After entering the society, the interpersonal relationship, the clients’ requests and the work pressure, they all push you to the dark abyss. But we are human, human heart always filled with little wishes, and always to go forward for those wishes, even if those wishes are just virtual bubbles, most human will not be discouraged, only hope that one day the darkness passed, sweet instead of sweat, the better life comes you didn't know, which is the reason that’s why you should let yourself be brave and braver.

This game simulates that  how you spend your whole life time in a dark tunnel, chasing the destination - the light at the end of the tunnel. But finally you gonna know this action is actually unmeaning, and understand how desperate the life is. It’s like, after you walked a long time, nearly complete the journey, but there is a trap waiting for you, it pushes you to another dark tunnel, again and again. And even though you finally have got out of the tunnel, meet something beautiful and peaceful, but open the door, there is another trap pushes you back to the another dark journey, endlessly.

  • Q & E To Control The Flashlight
  • WASD To Move
  • Space To Jump
  • Left-Shift To Speed Up
  • R To Get Redemption

This is a long or short journey, boring or funny. Maybe you'll think about what were your childhood dreams. Are you satisfied with present yourself? What have you insisted up to now? What made you lost that dreams you had? This game is endlessly passive but your life couldn't be, just do what you could do to colour your life if you still got something deeply in your heart - wake up is never too late.
